headline: UDR Reports Tax Treatment of 2025 Distributions
summary: DENVER, January 21, 2026--UDR, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust, reported today the tax status of its 2025 distributions paid to shareholders.
